title.rendered: Botslab Indoor Camera 2E (C212) with Lan Port

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text woodmart_inline=”no” text_larger=”no”]The Botslab Smart Indoor Camera 2E C212 is a versatile and user-friendly security device designed for home monitoring. Key features include 1080p HD video quality, two-way audio, and night vision capabilities, ensuring clear footage day and night. The camera offers real-time alerts and motion detection, sending notifications directly to your smartphone.

With its 360-degree panoramic view and smart tracking, it can automatically follow moving objects, capturing every angle. The device supports both cloud and local storage options, providing flexible data backup solutions.

Its compact design and easy setup make it an accessible choice for those looking to enhance their home security. Unique selling points include its affordability, comprehensive coverage, and seamless integration with smart home ecosystems.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered:
• 2K 3MP HD
  • LAN Port Support
  • AI Human Detection
  • 360° Smart Tracking
  • Two-Way Audio
  • Alexa & Google Assistant
  • Support NVR/ONVIF
